            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Code = '';
                        
                        if( $this->ControllerWasAdded === false )
                        {
                              $Code = '{direct_controller:set_permit=1;delete_permit=1;toggle_permit=1'.
                                          'package_name=permit::permit_controller}';
                                          
                              $this->ControllerWasAdded = true;
                        }

process_delete_permit_button ( $  Options,
$  Str,
$  Changed 
)

Function processes macro 'delete_permit_button'.

Parameters:
$Options - Processing options.
$Str - Processing string.
$Changed - Was the processing completed.
Returns:
array( $Str , $Changed ).
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 573 of file permit_markup.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Rules = array( 
                              'permit' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'master_id' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'master_type' => TERMINAL_VALUE
                        );
                        
                        for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'delete_permit_button' , $Rules ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->Settings->load_settings( $Parameters );
                              
                              list( $Text , $Group , $MasterId ) = $this->Settings->get_settings( 'text,group,master_id' );
                              $MasterType = $this->Settings->get_setting( 'master_type' , 'user' );
                              $CheckBoxes = $this->Settings->get_setting( 'checkboxes' , 'user' );
                              
                              $Code = $this->get_controller();
                              $Code .= "{href:text=$Text;page=javascript:ultimix.permit.DeletePermitButton".
                                    "( '$Permit' , $MasterId , '$MasterType' , '$CheckBoxes' )}";
                              
                              $Str = str_replace( "{delete_permit_button:$Parameters}" , $Code , $Str );
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

Definition at line 175 of file permit_markup.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        for( ; $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'no_permit' ) ; )
                        {
                              if( in_array( $MacroParameters , $this->Permits ) )
                              {
                                    $Str = $this->String->hide_block( 
                                          $Str , 'no_permit:'.$MacroParameters , 'no_permit:~'.$MacroParameters , $Changed
                                    );
                              }
                              else
                              {
                                    $Str = $this->String->show_block( 
                                          $Str , 'no_permit:'.$MacroParameters , 'no_permit:~'.$MacroParameters , $Changed
                                    );
                              }
                              
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )

Definition at line 235 of file permit_markup.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        /* printing list of all available permits */
                        if( strpos( $Str , '{permit_list}' ) !== false )
                        {
                              $this->Database->query_as( DB_OBJECT );
                              $Items = $this->Database->select( 'permit' , 'umx_permit' , '1 = 1' );
                              $c = count( $Items );
                              $AllPermits = '';
                              foreach( $Items as $k => $i )
                              {
                                    $AllPermits .= $i->permit;
                                    if( $k + 1 != $c )
                                    {
                                          $AllPermits .= ', ';
                                    }
                              }
                              $Str = str_replace( '{permit_list}' , $AllPermits , $Str );
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

process_permit_list_for_object ( $  Options,
$  Str,
$  Changed 
)

Function processes macro 'permit_list_for_object'.

Parameters:
$Options - Processing options.
$Str - Processing string.
$Changed - Was the processing completed.
Returns:
array( $Str , $Changed ).
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 295 of file permit_markup.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Rules = array( 'object' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'type' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
                        
                        for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'permit_list_for_object' , $Rules ) ; )
                        {
                              $PermitList = '';
                              
                              if( $this->PermitAlgorithms->object_has_permit( false , 'user' , 'permit_manager' ) )
                              {
                                    $this->Settings->load_settings( $Parameters );
                                    
                                    list( $Object , $Type ) = $this->Settings->get_settings( 'object,type' , 'public,' );
                                    $PermitList = $this->PermitAlgorithms->get_permits_for_object( $Object , $Type , false );
                                    sort( $PermitList );
                                    $PermitList = implode( ', ' , $PermitList );
                              }

                              $Str = str_replace( "{permit_list_for_object:$Parameters}" , $PermitList , $Str );
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

process_permit_list_widget ( $  Options,
$  Str,
$  Changed 
)

Function processes macro 'permit_list_widget'.

Parameters:
$Options - Processing options.
$Str - Processing string.
$Changed - Was the processing completed.
Returns:
array( $Str , $Changed ).
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 357 of file permit_markup.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Rules = array( 'all' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'object_permits' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
                        for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'permit_list_widget' , $Rules ) ; )
                        {
                              if( $this->PermitAlgorithms->object_has_permit( false , 'user' , 'permit_manager' ) )
                              {
                                    $CachedFS = get_package( 'cached_multy_fs' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
                                    $this->Settings->load_settings( $Parameters );
                                    
                                    $AllPermitList = $this->Settings->get_setting( 'all' , 'public' );
                                    if( strlen( $AllPermitList ) == 0 )
                                    {
                                          $AllPermitList = array();
                                    }
                                    else
                                    {
                                          $AllPermitList = explode( ', ' , $AllPermitList );
                                    }
                                    
                                    $ObjectPermitList = $this->Settings->get_setting( 'object_permits' , 'public' );
                                    if( strlen( $ObjectPermitList ) == 0 )
                                    {
                                          $ObjectPermitList = array();
                                    }
                                    else
                                    {
                                          $ObjectPermitList = explode( ', ' , $ObjectPermitList );
                                    }
                                    
                                    $PermitListWidget = $CachedFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'permit_list.tpl' );
                                    $PermitListWidget = str_replace( 
                                          '{object}' , $this->Settings->get_setting( 'object' ) , $PermitListWidget
                                    );
                                    
                                    sort( $ObjectPermitList );
                                    foreach( $ObjectPermitList as $key => $p )
                                    {
                                          $PermitListWidget = str_replace( 
                                                '{object_permits}' , 
                                                "<div class='double_panel_row no_selection_text' id='".$p.
                                                      "_div_id'><input type='hidden' id='".$p."_field_id' name='permits[]' value='$p'>".
                                                      "<a href=\"javascript:DeletePermit( '$p' );\">$p</a><br></div>{object_permits}" , 
                                                      $PermitListWidget
                                          );
                                    }
                                    
                                    sort( $AllPermitList );
                                    foreach( $AllPermitList as $key => $p )
                                    {
                                          if( in_array( $p , $ObjectPermitList ) === false )
                                          {
                                                $PermitListWidget = str_replace( 
                                                      '{rest_permits}' , 
                                                      "<div class='double_panel_row no_selection_text' id='".$p.
                                                            "_div_id_rest'><a href=\"javascript:AddPermit( '$p' );\">$p</a><br>".
                                                            "</div>{rest_permits}" , 
                                                      $PermitListWidget
                                                );
                                          }
                                    }
                              }
                              else
                              {
                                    $PermitListWidget = '';
                              }
                              
                              $Str = str_replace( 
                                    "{permit_list_widget:$Parameters}" , $PermitListWidget , $Str
                              );

                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

Definition at line 697 of file permit_markup.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Rules = array( 'name' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
                        
                        for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'permit_select' , $Rules ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->Settings->load_settings( $Parameters );
                              
                              list( $Name , $Class ) = $this->Settings->get_settings( 'name,class',  'permit,flat width_160' );
                                                            
                              $Code = "{select:name=$Name;class=$Class;".
                                          "query=SELECT id , title AS value FROM `umx_permit` ORDER BY title}";
                              
                              $Str = str_replace( "{permit_select:$Parameters}" , $Code , $Str );
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }

                  try
                  {
                        if( $this->Permits === false )
                        {
                              $this->Permits = $this->PermitAlgorithms->get_permits_for_object( false , 'user' );
                        }
                        
                        list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_permit( $Options , $Str , $Changed );
                        list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_no_permit( $Options , $Str , $Changed );
                        list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_permit_list( $Options , $Str , $Changed );
